description.value:
Primary Energy: Space 8 (negating magical energies in area) Supporting Energy: Time 3 (duration 10 minutes) Range: 10-foot radius, centered on self Duration: 10 minutes Total Cost: 11 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Creates a 10ft radius sphere around you that suppresses all magic. Weaves cannot be cast into or out of the field. Magical items cease functioning. Active weaves are suppressed while in the field. Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 1 hour, 4 = 4 hours, 5 = 12 hours

O
